settings.title: Why Choose Us for Jewelry Repair in Boca Raton

settings.content:
1. Schedule your appointment or just swing by, walk-ins welcome.
  2. Visit our private Boca Raton showroom for a free evaluation, cleaning, and no obligation quote.
  3. Most repairs such as ring sizing and stone tightening are finished within a week, with many simpler jobs ready the same or next day.
settings.label: BOOK MY SERVICE

settings.bullet: Schedule your appointment or just swing by, walk-ins welcome.
Visit our private Boca Raton showroom for a free evaluation, cleaning, and no obligation quote.
Most repairs such as ring sizing and stone tightening are finished within a week, with many simpler jobs ready the same or next day.
Metal type Platinum demands precise laser seams; 18k yellow gold calls for color matched solder.
Stone type & security Diamonds, sapphires, or emeralds each require unique heat tolerances and careful prong retipping.
Design complexity Vintage filigree or pavé halos often need CAD custom jewelry modeling to recreate lost details.
Finishing techniques Rhodium replating, ultrasonic cleaning, and hand polishing restore showroom brilliance without removing excess metal.

settings.heading: The Diamonds by Raymond Lee Story

settings.text: Diamonds by Raymond Lee, a distinguished name in Boca Raton, Florida, is synonymous with ultra-luxury, custom-designed jewelry. For over 40 years, this family-owned and operated business has been a beacon of excellence in the high-end jewelry market, serving a clientele that demands nothing but the best. With a commitment to unparalleled craftsmanship, bespoke designs, and the finest materials, Diamonds by Raymond Lee stands out as a premier destination for those seeking the epitome of luxury in jewelry. At Diamonds by Raymond Lee, we are more than just a jewelry store. We are a family, a community, and a symbol of timeless elegance and beauty.
